Text: Movie was lame, but rip is good
I loved this movie, thx for the good quality rip

The video quality is not up to par, even for a DVDRip. If you are going to watch this on a traditional television or on a computer, you should have no problem. However, if you plan on streaming this to a larger HDTV, be prepared for significant quality distortion.

Just had to add this note. Excellent sound and video on my HD TV and surround sound system. The only DVD's I have watched that were better than this were movies that were done 100% in Digital and released on DVD. Thanks again!!!
